name: Sex Prison
description:
Sex Prison is an adult-only visual novel. The game tells an exciting story about life on a space prison in the distant future. Players will be plunged into this story in which the main character has been wrongly convicted and sent to this prison.
The player will be immersed in life in a space prison, where the main character is struggling to survive. She is unjustly imprisoned in a prison from which there is only one way out... And sex is the only way out. The game will present the player with characters, each of them with their own story and motivation. Immerse yourself in a unique story that will make the player think about how difficult it is to survive in space and fight for their lives in isolation.
The graphics in the game are in the style of science fiction, combining elements of the future and space. The game has atmospheric music, which will help the player to plunge into the atmosphere of the space prison.
